# Computer Aided Dispatch Next Generation (CAD NG) Tender Announcement
=====================================

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference**: PW-EEM-044-41092
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: M7594-203850/B
* **Publication Date**: September 1, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 7, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Current Tender Status**: Expired

### Contract Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreement**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Daniel Pilon
* **Contact Email**: [Daniel.Pilon3@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Daniel.Pilon3@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (873) 455-4875
* **Contact Fax**: (873) 455-4875

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada seeks responses from industry suppliers regarding the Computer Aided Dispatch Next Generation (CAD NG) project. This is not a bid solicitation, but rather an opportunity for suppliers to provide information based on the provided documents.

Suppliers may submit documentation in either official language of Canada. Note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Documents

Please refer to the following attachments for more information:

* [CAD NG RFI Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/8c7b8caf1a2cc35d3a75b63e343d784c/ABES.PROD.PW_EEM.B044.E41092.EBSU001.PDF)
* [CAD NG Background Information Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/31/11ffb7087c47fff2ea882bede5be53d6/ABES.PROD.PW_EEM.B044.E41092
